verses.roman:
ye ei-sakala kathā śune śraddhā kari'
tāṅre kṛṣṇa-prema-dhana dena gaurahari

synonyms: ye—one who; ei-sakala—all these; kathā—topics; śune—hears; śraddhā kari'-with faith and love; tāṅre—unto him; kṛṣṇa-prema-dhana—the wealth of ecstatic love of Lord Kṛṣṇa; dena—delivers; gaurahari—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu [Gaurahari] bestows ecstatic love for Kṛṣṇa upon anyone who hears all these topics with faith and love.
